column4: if there is anyone in here familiar with xinerama, is there a way to force an application to open on a set screen?
gstream is a plugin, am i right.. like arts.
the default installation of totem is totem-gstreamer (as opposed to totem-zine), it has a plugin for each file type
i   have this option in amaroke for gstream and arts. so its confusing.
well, yes, gstreamer is the audio system and it uses the codecs for each file type
Does it do remote sound ? like arts..
gstreamer is pretty good, except it still has some issues with sound/video latency
not, sure never really dabbled in that area
there is a lot of development happening with ubuntu and gstreamer to get it working top notch :)
